showboard

Interface IPawn

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ISquare
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IEntity
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Dead, Door, Enemy, Entity, Key, Loot, Player, Spell

    public interface IPawn
extends ISquare

    The Interface IPawn.

    A class can implement the IPawn interface when it wants to move on a IBoard.

    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Anne-Emilie DIET
    See Also:
    IBoard, ISquare, Point
